  • Constructor Details

    • MessageHandler

      public MessageHandler(GUI gui)
      Constructs a new MessageHandler object.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • onConnectedServerMessage

      public void onConnectedServerMessage(ConnectedToServerMessage connectedToServerMessage)
      Handles the event when the client successfully connects to the server. This method updates the GUI phase to LOGIN, sets the current scene to the menu scene, and changes the scene to the updated one.
      Specified by:
      onConnectedServerMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      connectedToServerMessage - The ConnectedToServerMessage indicating a successful connection to the server.

    • onCreateLobbyResponse

      public void onCreateLobbyResponse(CreateLobbyResponse createLobbyResponse)
      Handles the response when creating a lobby. If the response indicates a successful lobby creation, this method updates the GUI phase to IN_LOBBY, sets the current scene to the in-lobby scene, changes the scene to the updated one, sets the admin name, and initializes a new chat box.
      Specified by:
      onCreateLobbyResponse in interface View
      Parameters:
      createLobbyResponse - The CreateLobbyResponse indicating the result of the lobby creation.

    • onJoinLobbyResponse

      public void onJoinLobbyResponse(JoinLobbyResponse joinLobbyResponse)
      Handles the response when joining a lobby. If the response indicates that the join request was refused, it sets the error message in the GUI. If the response indicates that the player successfully joined the lobby, it updates the GUI phase to IN_LOBBY, sets the current scene to the in-lobby scene, changes the scene to the updated one, sets the player names, disables the spinner, and initializes a new chat box. If the response indicates that the player has reconnected to a game, it updates the GUI phase to GAME, sets the current scene to the game scene, and changes the scene to the updated one.
      Specified by:
      onJoinLobbyResponse in interface View
      Parameters:
      joinLobbyResponse - The JoinLobbyResponse indicating the result of the lobby join request.

    • onLobbyListResponse

      public void onLobbyListResponse(LobbyListResponse lobbyListResponse)
      Handles the response containing the list of available lobbies. It updates the lobbies list in the class and notifies the GUI to display the updated list.
      Specified by:
      onLobbyListResponse in interface View
      Parameters:
      lobbyListResponse - The LobbyListResponse containing the list of available lobbies.

    • onLoginResponse

      public void onLoginResponse(LoginResponse loginResponse)
      Handles the response received after attempting to log in to the server. If the login is successful, it updates the username and transitions to the server scene, displaying the list of available lobbies. If the login fails, it displays an error message indicating that the username is already in use.
      Specified by:
      onLoginResponse in interface View
      Parameters:
      loginResponse - The LoginResponse containing the login result.

    • onReconnectionMessage

      public void onReconnectionMessage(ReconnectionMessage reconnectionMessage)
      Handles the reconnection message received after a successful reconnection to the game. It updates the personal goal card, sets the phase to "GAME", and transitions to the game scene. The player state is set to "WATCHING" and the game view is updated with the reconnected player's information. A welcome notification is displayed, and the chat messages are updated if available.
      Specified by:
      onReconnectionMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      reconnectionMessage - The ReconnectionMessage containing the reconnection information.

    • onUsernameResponse

      public void onUsernameResponse(UsernameResponse usernameResponse)
      Handles the response received after requesting a username change. If the username change is successful, the player's username is updated, and an alert is displayed. If the username change is unsuccessful, an error message is displayed.
      Specified by:
      onUsernameResponse in interface View
      Parameters:
      usernameResponse - The UsernameResponse containing the result of the username change request.

    • onAchievedCommonGoalMessage

      public void onAchievedCommonGoalMessage(AchievedCommonGoalMessage achievedCommonGoalMessage)
      Handles the message received when a player achieves a common goal. Updates the icons of the player who achieved the goal.
      Specified by:
      onAchievedCommonGoalMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      achievedCommonGoalMessage - The AchievedCommonGoalMessage containing the details of the achieved common goal.

    • onGameStartedMessage

      public void onGameStartedMessage(GameStartedMessage gameStartedMessage)
      Handles the message received when the game has started.
      Specified by:
      onGameStartedMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      gameStartedMessage - The GameStartedMessage containing the game information. Updates the GUI phase to the GAME phase and changes the current scene to the game scene.

    • onInsertInfoMessage

      public void onInsertInfoMessage(InsertInfoMessage insertInfoMessage)
      Handles the message received when the player needs to insert tiles from their hand.
      Specified by:
      onInsertInfoMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      insertInfoMessage - The InsertInfoMessage containing the hand tiles to be inserted.

      Updates the GUI player state to ACTIVE and sets the action type to INSERT_HAND. Updates the GUI hand with the tiles from the insertInfoMessage.

    • onLastTurnMessage

      public void onLastTurnMessage(LastTurnMessage lastTurnMessage)
      Handles the message received when it is the last turn of the game.
      Specified by:
      onLastTurnMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      lastTurnMessage - The LastTurnMessage indicating that it is the last turn. Updates the GUI game notification to indicate that it is the last turn.

    • onLeaderBoardMessage

      public void onLeaderBoardMessage(LeaderBoardMessage leaderBoardMessage)
      Description copied from interface: View
      Called when a Leader Board Message is received.
      Specified by:
      onLeaderBoardMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      leaderBoardMessage - The leader Board message.

    • onNewTurnMessage

      public void onNewTurnMessage(NewTurnMessage newTurnMessage)
      Handles the message received at the start of a new turn.
      Specified by:
      onNewTurnMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      newTurnMessage - The NewTurnMessage containing the information about the new turn.

      This method updates the GUI with the necessary information for the new turn. It clears the tiles, sets the action type to "NONE", displays a notification message, and updates the turn indicator. If the current player is the same as the user's username, it displays a notification indicating that it's their turn. Otherwise, it displays the notification received in the message.

    • onNoCommonGoalMessage

      public void onNoCommonGoalMessage(NoCommonGoalMessage noCommonGoalMessage)
      Handles the message indicating that no common goal is available.
      Specified by:
      onNoCommonGoalMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      noCommonGoalMessage - The NoCommonGoalMessage indicating the absence of a common goal. This method currently does not perform any actions in the GUI.

    • onPersonalGoalCardMessage

      public void onPersonalGoalCardMessage(PersonalGoalCardMessage personalGoalCardMessage)
      Handles the message containing the personal goal card for the player.
      Specified by:
      onPersonalGoalCardMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      personalGoalCardMessage - The PersonalGoalCardMessage containing the player's personal goal card. This method updates the personal goal card in the GUI with the provided card from the message.

    • onPersonalGoalPointsMessage

      public void onPersonalGoalPointsMessage(PersonalGoalPointsMessage personalGoalPointsMessage)
      Handles the message containing the points scored for a personal goal.
      Specified by:
      onPersonalGoalPointsMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      personalGoalPointsMessage - The PersonalGoalPointsMessage containing the points scored for a personal goal.

      This method can be used to update the GUI with the points scored for a personal goal by a player. However, the current implementation does not perform any specific actions.

    • onPlayerLeftMessage

      public void onPlayerLeftMessage(PlayerLeftMessage playerLeftMessage)
      Handles the message indicating that a player has left the game.
      Specified by:
      onPlayerLeftMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      playerLeftMessage - The PlayerLeftMessage indicating that a player has left the game.

      This method can be used to update the GUI with a notification about the player who left the game. The provided content in the message can be displayed as a notification to inform other players about the event.

    • onPlayerRejoinedMessage

      public void onPlayerRejoinedMessage(PlayerRejoinedMessage playerRejoinedMessage)
      Handles the message indicating that a player has rejoined the game.
      Specified by:
      onPlayerRejoinedMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      playerRejoinedMessage - The PlayerRejoinedMessage indicating that a player has rejoined the game.

      This method can be used to update the GUI with a notification about the player who rejoined the game. The provided player information in the message can be displayed as a notification to inform other players about the event.

    • onChangeNumOfPlayerResponse

      public void onChangeNumOfPlayerResponse(ChangeNumOfPlayerResponse changeNumOfPlayerResponse)
      Handles the response message indicating the result of a request to change the number of players in the game.
      Specified by:
      onChangeNumOfPlayerResponse in interface View
      Parameters:
      changeNumOfPlayerResponse - The ChangeNumOfPlayerResponse indicating the result of the request.

      This method can be used to update the GUI based on the response from the server. If the request was successful, the chosen number of players can be displayed in the spinner control. If the request failed, an error message can be displayed to inform the user about the failure.

    • onExitLobbyResponse

      public void onExitLobbyResponse(ExitLobbyResponse exitLobbyResponse)
      Handles the response message indicating the result of a request to exit the lobby.
      Specified by:
      onExitLobbyResponse in interface View
      Parameters:
      exitLobbyResponse - The ExitLobbyResponse indicating the result of the request.

      This method can be used to update the GUI based on the response from the server. If the request was successful, the GUI phase can be set to the server phase, the scene can be changed to the server scene, and the chat box can be cleared.

    • onGameNotReadyMessage

      public void onGameNotReadyMessage(GameNotReadyMessage gameNotReadyMessage)
      Handles the message indicating that the game is not ready to start.
      Specified by:
      onGameNotReadyMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      gameNotReadyMessage - The GameNotReadyMessage indicating the reason why the game is not ready.

      This method can be used to display an error message on the GUI indicating that the game cannot start due to certain conditions not being met.

      Handles the message indicating that the player is not the admin of the lobby.
      Specified by:
      onNotAdminMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      notAdminMessage - The NotAdminMessage containing information about the admin status.

      This method can be used to display an error message on the GUI when a non-admin player tries to use a command that is restricted to the lobby admin.

      Specified by:
      onPlayersInLobbyUpdate in interface View
      Parameters:
      playersInLobbyUpdate - The PlayersInLobbyUpdate message containing the updated player list. This method can be used to update the player list displayed on the GUI when there are changes in the lobby's player roster.

    • update

      public void update(Message message)
      Updates the GUI based on the received message from the server.
      Specified by:
      update in interface View
      Parameters:
      message - The message received from the server.

      This method is responsible for handling different types of messages and updating the GUI accordingly. It checks the type of the message and calls the corresponding handler method to process the message. If the message type is not recognized, it prints an error message indicating that the message is ignored.
